#labels Phase-Implementation

_Function_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/http.h>

bool *pgm_http_shutdown* (void);
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Stop and destroy a running HTTP interface.

=== Return Value ===
On success, <tt>TRUE</tt> is returned.  On error, <tt>FALSE</tt> is returned.
